Model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.util.Observable
    The model class includes the logic behind the mosaic generator.
    Author:
    Thielen M.

      • Model

        public Model()

    • Method Detail

      • changeTargetImage

        public void changeTargetImage(java.lang.String imagePath)
        This method first loads a new image out of a given path. Then it adjusts the size of this image if needed and changes the target image finally.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path of the image to load.

      • changeSizeOfTiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> changeSizeOfTiles(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> tileList,
                                                   int newWidth,
                                                   int newHeight)
        This function returns a new list of scaled tiles. This function just will be used to change the size of own tiles. The example tiles will be unaffected.
        Parameters:
        tileList - - The tile list which is supposed to be re scaled.
        newWidth - - The new width of the tile elements.
        newHeight - - The new height of the tile elements.
        Returns:
        Returns a new list of scaled tiles.

      • useSampleTemplates

        public void useSampleTemplates()
        Changes the used templates to the sample ones and creates a new tile list.

      • useOwnTamplates

        public void useOwnTamplates()
        Changes the used templates to the own ones and creates a new tile list.

      • updateOwnTiles

        public void updateOwnTiles(int newWidth,
                           int newHeight)
        Re scales the own tile list and updates the values.
        Parameters:
        newWidth - - The new width of the tiles
        newHeight - - the new height of the tiles

      • generate_tile_list_targetImage

        public void generate_tile_list_targetImage()
        This method generates tiles out of the target image. Those tiles will be saved into a list of tiles and will be used to compare them with the sample tiles of the other list. The image which will be fragmented in tiles.

      • generate_tile_list_resultImage

        public void generate_tile_list_resultImage()
        This method generates a list of tiles which will be used to generate the final mosaic image. It will compare the lists of tiles of the source image and the template images.

      • generate_mosaic

        public void generate_mosaic()
        This method builds a mosaic image out of the tiles within the result tile list and saves it to the folder "Result" as PNG image.

      • saveImage

        public void saveImage(java.lang.String path)
        Tries to save the result mosaic image into the given folder
        Parameters:
        path - - The path where to save the file (with file name).

      • loadOwnTiles

        public void loadOwnTiles(int tileWidth,
                         int tileHeight)
        This function loads own tiles out of the Tile folder. There will be only tiles loaded which fits with the given size and images with a wrong solution won't be re scaled!
        Parameters:
        tileWidth - - The width of the tiles
        tileHeight - - The height of the tiles

      • open_resultImage_folder

        public void open_resultImage_folder()
        Opens the folder where the result mosaic images are saved inside.

      • modelChanged

        public void modelChanged()
        Informs the observer that the model has been changed.
